templateApplicationNote.message: Yadda za a yi amfani da samfuran da aka keɓance:

templateApplicationInstructions.message:
An riga an yi amfani da tambayoyin da aka keɓance lokacin da kuka zaɓi rubutu kuma ku zaɓi yanayin da ya dace
Canje-canje zasu fara aiki nan take - ba buƙatar sake farawa ba
Za ku iya dawo da duk wani tambaya zuwa tsoho ta hanyar amfani da maɓallin dawo da
